title: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max General Availability
description: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max became generally available across all Copilot tiers, described as a top-end OpenAI model in Copilot's selectable model roster.

title: Daily Nightly Releases and Documentation Updates
description: Gemini CLI continues daily v0.21.0-nightly releases with recent changelog documentation updates on December 17, 2025. Active development with higher limits for Pro and Ultra subscribers.

title: OpenAI GPT-5.2 Public Preview Integration
description: GPT-5.2 launched in public preview for GitHub Copilot with enhanced long context understanding and front-end UI generation capabilities. Available to Copilot Pro, Business, and Enterprise users.

community_feedback.quote: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max can handle really complex web task without...
GPT 5.2 released - waiting for it to show up in vs code!
Why does GPT-5.2 stop so much?
GPT 5.2 failing to complete multi step tasks in Copilot Agent
impressive single-prompt execution while others find it less reliable than previous models

title: Codex CLI 0.71.0 with GPT-5.2 Integration
description: Major release introducing GPT-5.2 integration, shell snapshotting enhancements, experimental skills support, and new /experimental slash command. Significant UX improvements across the platform.

community_feedback.quote: OpenAI will use Rust to rebuild Codex CLI, abandoning the previous TypeScript version

title: Anthropic Acquires Bun, Claude Code Reaches $1B Milestone
description: Anthropic acquired Bun JavaScript runtime and Claude Code reached $1 billion run-rate revenue milestone. Claude Code 2.0.70 released with 13 CLI changes including 3x improved memory usage and enhanced auto-update features.

community_feedback.quote: Over the last several months, the GitHub username with the most merged PRs in Bun's repo is now a Claude Code bot
Claude Code is a '$1B+ cash machine' and Anthropic directly uses Bun for it. Acquiring Bun lowers the risk of the software being unmaintained
bun stays open source, which allows it to continue to grow
Anthropic is acquiring @bunjavascript to further accelerate Claude Code's growth

title: Winter Launch Week 2025 Updates
description: Continue announced five major upgrades focused on reducing integration work, turning fragmented toolchains into self-healing systems with enhanced workflow automation and MCP Server integration.
